items.sentence: Are you looking for something in particular?
Are you really going to Boston next weekend?
I think Tom will do that, but I\'m not sure.
Tom hacked his way through the jungle alone.
Tom had a heart attack while shoveling snow.
Tom had enough money to buy a few groceries.
Tom had hoped that he would win the lottery.
Tom doesn\'t want to talk to Mary right now.
Tom opened the apartment door and walked in.
Tom opened the back door to let the dog out.
Tom opened the door and turned on the light.
Tom opened the drawer and took out a pencil.
Tom opened the fridge and took out the milk.
It would be a shame to break down this door.
It would take forever to explain everything.
Tom is babysitting Mary\'s children tonight.
She danced with him at the high school prom.
She earns half as much money as her husband.
She first met him at a conference in Boston.
She had no intention of quarreling with him.
